section.title: High Level Overview
section.p: Flow Automation supports the automation of basic daily tasks, and complex end-to-end activities in IDUN. Flow Automation is used to do the following:

li.p: Provides an execution environment for predefined flows.
Explore a list of available flows and view summary information.
List and sort active and historic flow instances.
View details of a specific flow instance.
View and export a report from a specific flow instance.

section.title: Setup Phase Limitations
section.p: The flows can enable the ability to go back in the setup phase user tasks. The flow automation application takes care of retaining the previously submitted data for all the widgets in a user task except for Scoping Panel and in that case the user is required to provide the data again.
